featured.text: The success of the park is exactly what Morgan intended to achieve.

other.text: By exhaling air from the lungs in short (36) of laughter, breathing is quickened and heartbeats increased, which achieves (37) good as ten minutes on an exercise bike.

definition.en_def: To successfully reach a desired objective or result through effort.
definition.example: She worked hard to achieve her dream of becoming a doctor.
